name: v2.2.2
body:
# Release notes for v2.2.2
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_kotlin", version = "2.2.2")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_kotlin",
    sha256 = "411db26afb3492cc8351b5b5349931522afe2c54f2651b6d127730a1256d0f60",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/releases/download/v2.2.2/rules_kotlin-v2.2.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_kotlin//kotlin:repositories.bzl", "kotlin_repositories")
kotlin_repositories() # if you want the default. Otherwise see custom kotlinc distribution below

load("@rules_kotlin//kotlin:core.bzl", "kt_register_toolchains")
kt_register_toolchains() # to use the default toolchain, otherwise see toolchains below
```


## What's Changed
* Fix Windows bzlmod builder classpath issue by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1411
* Migrate from KSP1 (compiler plugin) to KSP2 (standalone tool) by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1405
* Fix post-merge error by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1420
* Document x_lambdas and x_sam_conversions defaults by @johnnymo87 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1419
* .bazelrc: do not add IntelliJ-internal packages to --deleted_pacakges by @aehlig in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1422
* maintenance: Enable Build Tools API by default by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1426
* Move to the official bazel worker api (with workspace support) by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1400
* chore: Add a target to update docs automatically by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1421

## New Contributors
* @johnnymo87 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1419
* @aehlig made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1422

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/compare/v2.2.1...v2.2.2

name: v2.2.0
body:
# Release notes for v2.2.0

Add support for Kotlin 2.2+

**Note**: This release is not backwards compatible with Kotlin releases pre-dating 2.2.

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_kotlin", version = "2.2.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_kotlin",
    sha256 = "e124d13986085bc0a15be2c85c1415bab5708442b78d249fe22bf8df43a5340d",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/releases/download/v2.2.0/rules_kotlin-v2.2.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_kotlin//kotlin:repositories.bzl", "kotlin_repositories")
kotlin_repositories() # if you want the default. Otherwise see custom kotlinc distribution below

load("@rules_kotlin//kotlin:core.bzl", "kt_register_toolchains")
kt_register_toolchains() # to use the default toolchain, otherwise see toolchains below
```


## What's Changed
* Update `resource_strip_prefix` logic to support path handling across modules by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1389
* Remove leftover debug logging from resource_strip_prefix_test.bzl by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1399
* Add support for Kotlin 2.2+ by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1387


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/compare/v2.1.10...v2.2.0



## What's Changed
* Add support for experimental `removeDebugInfo`  flag by @ThomasCJY in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1342
* Add support for env_inherit by @gibfahn in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/942
* Fix non-file inclusion into runfiles for data. by @restingbull in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1349
* Shard integration tests by @restingbull in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1350
* Fix doc in kotlin jvm.bzl by @ThomasCJY in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1355
* Allow multiple kt_plugin_cfg by @restingbull in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1353
* Generate KSP classes jar as output by @smocherla-brex in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1329
* [kapt] allow options to be passed to kapt and javac annotation processing.  by @restingbull in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1354
* Stop enabling Java Security Manager before Java 24 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1360
* Add data attr to kt_plugin_cfg and kt_compiler_plugin by @rbeazleyspot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1364
* Allow setting newer language versions in toolchain by @gottagofaster236 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1367
* Mark released extension as reproducible by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1366
* Restore user dependency precedence over stdlib in classpath by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1369
* ktlint_fix: /bin/bash -> /usr/bin/env bash by @dmivankov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1371
* ktlint_fix: use `java` from toolchain rather than from default PATH by @dmivankov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1375
* Add support for Experimental x_context_parameters by @kevomacartney in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1376
* Update rules_bazel_integration_test by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1383
* kt_jvm_binary: resolve JVM via runfiles path (fixes #1332) by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1380
* Add env and env_inherit support to kt_jvm_binary by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1379
* Windows portability fixes by @FaBrand in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1386
* Bump bazel version to 8.4.2 by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1382
* Update Java runtime version to remotejdk_17 in .bazelrc by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1390
* Add support for x_warning_level by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1391
* Migrate jetpack_compose example to bzlmod and update it by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1393

## New Contributors
* @gibfahn made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/942
* @smocherla-brex made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1329
* @gottagofaster236 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1367
* @dmivankov made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1371
* @kevomacartney made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1376
* @FaBrand made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1386

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/compare/v2.1.8...v2.1.10

* Add x_suppress_warning to kotlinc options by @cheister in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1306
* Fix FileAlreadyExistsException when running coverage with RBE by @laureanobrs in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1307
* Remove duplicate and unused WorkingDirectoryContext by @erikkerber in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1308
* [exports] Propagate runfiles as part of exported resources by @restingbull in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1310
* Use `export_files` to export the KSP JAR files by @kpitt in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1313

* Add x_annotation_default_target kotlinc option by @erikkerber in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1314
* Add support for Kotlin 2.1.20 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1298
* Update KtLint to 1.5.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1281
* Rework local development docs by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1321
* Update rules_android to 0.6.4 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1317

* Update KtLint to 1.6.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1319
* Bump Bazel versions to their latest minor releases by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1315
* Add missing load statements in setup.bzl by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1322
* Apply equivalent of changes from #1274 to release build file by @ahumesky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1324
* Updating plexus-utils to patch CVE-2022-4244 by @aaronmaxlevy in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1327
* Update JC plugin to support AS Layout Inspector by @zalewskise in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1297
* Upgrade Kotlin to 2.1.21, KSP to 2.1.21-2.0.1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1323

name: v2.1.0
body:
# Release notes for v2.1.0

Adds support for Kotlin 2.1.0 and above.

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_kotlin", version = "2.1.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_kotlin",
    sha256 = "dd32f19e73c70f32ccb9a166c615c0ca4aed8e27e72c4a6330c3523eafa1aa55",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/releases/download/v2.1.0/rules_kotlin-v2.1.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Pass generated_source_jar to the final JavaInfo by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1223
* [infra] Use kotlin standard libraries from the toolchain, as opposed to hard coded. by @restingbull in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1225
* Add rules_jvm_external overrides for stdlib by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1219
* Stop suggesting that Java's `exported_plugins` is transitive. by @cpovirk in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1236
* Add a current_toolchain target to be referenced by kt_toolchain attribute by @jdai8 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1239
* Fix workspace resolution for development by @restingbull in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1231
* fix running kotlin targets by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1242
* Add support for -Xconsistent-data-class-copy-visibility by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1247
* Create a new "bootstrap" toolchain and compile with 2.1.0 by @restingbull in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1244
* Fix typo in src/main/starlark/core/compile/BUILD.release.bazel by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1253
* Query the release target in the integration tests by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1254

## New Contributors
* @cpovirk made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1236

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/compare/v2.0.0...v2.1.0

name: v1.9.0
body:
## This release of rules_kotlin comes with some breaking changes:
- The `build_bazel_rules_android` repository namespace has been renamed to `rules_android`. Please update your WORKSPACE files to avoid downloading these rules multiple times! https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1047
- In order to support Bzlmod, the Kotlin and KSP targets have been moved out of the `io_bazel_rules_kotlin` repository and into `rules_kotlin`. If you are referencing any targets under `@com_github_jetbrains_kotlin//...` in your build files you will need to replace them with `@rules_kotlin//kotlin/compiler:...`. https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1014

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6+

Note: Bzlmod support inside of `rules_kotlin` is still very much considered experimental. Please report any issues that you run into!

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_kotlin", version = "1.9.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_kotlin",
    sha256 = "5766f1e599acf551aa56f49dab9ab9108269b03c557496c54acaf41f98e2b8d6",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/releases/download/v1.9.0/rules_kotlin-v1.9.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Move the KSP and compiler target definitions into rules_kotlin by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1014
* Add support for Bzlmod by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1006
* Enables compiling against direct dependencies only - kotlin by @nkoroste in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/842
* Add support for -Xno-source-debug-extension by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1025
* Include Bzlmod files into release binary by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1026
* Enable Bzlmod for examples/android by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1031
* Update and align rules_python versions on 0.23.1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1029
* Update buildifier to 6.3.3 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1027
* Update MODULE.bazel rules_jvm_external to 5.3 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1028
* Enable Bzlmod for examples/multiplex by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1030
* Load JavaInfo and java_common from rules_java by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1037
* Fix the nouse_workers_with_dexbuilder error by @sgowroji in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1040
* Rename build_bazel_rules_android to rules_android by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1047
* Remove copy/pasted BUILD files that call kt_configure_toolchains by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1053
* Add BUILD.release.bazel file for src/main/starlark/core/repositories/kotlin/ by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1052
* Update bazel_skylib 1.3.0 -> 1.4.1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1049
* Fix Android support when running the entire test suite by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1051
* [bazel-bsp-aspect] extract more generated jars by @xuansontrinh in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1046
* Add Android Platforms build flags. by @katre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1054
* Add support for Kotlin 1.9 by @agluszak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/996
* Add BCR configurations for publishing releases to the central registry by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1038

## New Contributors
* @sgowroji made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1040
* @xuansontrinh made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1046
* @katre made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/1054
* @agluszak made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/996

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/compare/v1.8.1...v1.9.0

* Update Bazel from 5.1.1 -> 5.2.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/766

* Remove unused build_java attribute by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/788
* Update to Kotlin 1.7.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/769

* Remove -Xuse-experimental from legacy opts by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/767
* Update the workspace to use the prebuilt image over rbe autoconfig. by @restingbull in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/744
* pass exec_properties to underlying android_local_test macro by @Augustyniak in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/810
* Add instructions to attach debugger to debug java/kt actions by @oliviernotteghem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/814

* Fix jdeps tracking case for class extension by @oliviernotteghem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/812
* Fix RBE builds on master by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/818
* Update Dagger from 2.41 -> 2.43.2 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/817
* Update compose example to Kotlin 1.7.10 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/820
* Update rules_kotlin to Kotlin 1.7.10 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/821
* Cleanup bunch of small issues in JdepsGetExtension.kt by @aeremin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/819
* Update kotlin.bzl by @SebastianHelzer in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/816
* [KtLint] Support --android and --experimental by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/824
* update rules_nodejs by @aranguyen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/830
* Bump bazel to 5.3.0 by @hanneskaeufler in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/833

* [KtLint] Add ktlint.check and ktlint.fix make commands by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/834
* Add an env attribute to kt_jvm_test by @meastham in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/837
* update rules_nodejs & bazel_skylib by @aranguyen in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/835
* Move versioned repositories to top level `src` dir by @restingbull in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/838
* Support testing both k2 and old compiler for Jdeps by @rockwotj in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/845
* Update rules_kotlin to Kotlin 1.7.20 by @rockwotj in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/844
* Add -XX:-MaxFDLimit to builder binaries by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/848
* [CI] Update buildifier from 5.0.0 to 5.1.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/847
* Improve missing strict deps warnings by @lukaciko in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/851
* [CI] Update Bazel from 5.3.0 to 5.3.1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/846
* Bazel 6.0: Fix config_setting visibility failure on bazel CI by @gregestren in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/853
* Add option to enable/disable jdeps generation by @nkoroste in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/852
* Remove unused dependency in example by @hanneskaeufler in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/862
* Fix AbstractMethodError in JdepsGenCommandLineProcessor by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/859
* Do not auto refresh archive_repository on windows by @restingbull in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/861
* Pass nocompress_extensions to base android_local_test rule by @pswaminathan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/873
* Update Kotlin to 1.7.21 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/872
* Fix misattributed compiler argument. by @restingbull in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/876
* Support setting kotlin_jvm_target at the target level by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/865
* Bug: No compilation occurs when module only contains resources + no sources by @EdbertChan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/875
* Update Bazel from 5.3.1 -> 5.3.2 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/867
* Pass runfiles paths more robustly by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/860
* Update Kotlin from 1.7.21 -> 1.7.22 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/886
* Update Ktlint 0.47.1 -> 0.48.0 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/887
* Update Bazel to 6.0.0-pre.20221020.1 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/889
* Bump express from 4.16.3 to 4.17.3 in /examples/node by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/879
* Remove Jetpack Compose hacks now that we are on Bazel 6 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/890
* Update rules_jvm_external from 4.2 -> 4.4.2 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/866
* Add sample app to tests how many targets were rebuilt  by @nkoroste in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/840
* More Bazel 6.0 cleanup by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/891
* Enable new jarfs for multiplex workers. by @restingbull in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/888
* Upgrade dependencies by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/901
* Bump the Bazel version to Bazel 6 official by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_kotlin/pull/898
